root: ^Syviis, first of their name, from the Eastern Auroran Village, and destined Truthseer…
^What brings you here into my womb?

syviis: ^I- I was sent here from the Village Seer Hyacinth, she said I was being tested, and that this is my journey, that you put me on this path.
mother1: ^Ever since you were born until you’ve reached full maturity you have been set on a specific path to ensure you reach me, so that we could finally meet.
mother2: ^You have a destined path, just like every faery has. Each faery needs to fulfill their destiny, and yours involves this meeting.
syviis3: ^I was always made to be alone?
mother3: ^Yes, it was only for your own good Syviis. Those on the destined path to be Truthseer must not have any ties to other faeries during their developmental years.
^We allowed you to have a companion, but you could never get too close to her… could you?
action: ^*The hair on your neck shoots up, as a chill races down your spine.*
mother4: ^We are all connected, I am one with every flesh, blood, and life that is created here, on Luminescira, even you. We have always been there, watching you, guiding you. Everything happens in your life for a reason Syviis.
action1: ^You stand completely frozen, unable to utter a single word.
mother5: ^That’s why we chose Lyra to be your temporary companion, she’ll take care of you and make you feel good, but there will be no strings attached once you become Truthseer.
syviis5: ^How… Wha- why? Why… would you do this to me? Was Lyra just there for me…
^she only cared for me because of you?!
mother7: ^Oh Syviis… you were created by me to become the next Truthseer, it is what you’re built to do. How do you explain the dreams?
mother9: ^Lyra is the least important thing in your life, Syviis.
^What you need to focus on now, is your destiny.
^You're special, a high power, a pure power.
action2: ^*Your head spins and your stomach turns as the truth infiltrates your body.*
motherReal: ^Fortunately no, Lyra was always made to be a decoy, just like her mother, and her grandmother, and so on. So, don’t worry! Lyra will be fine, she won’t even remember anything about you, it will be painless!
^She was always destined to have a family of her own… just not with you.
motherLyra: ^Well, she’ll go to another faery and carry on both of their lineages together, just like how she was destined to live.
syviis6: ^Will I be able to see Lyra? Or talk to her?
mother10: ^Yes, you’ll be able to see her but, everyone in your village will have their minds completely wiped of any memory of you. You will be only viewed as Syviis the Truthseer to Luminescira.
^Even if you try to talk to Lyra she won’t remember you, her lowly self will only see you as a higher power, the being you’re destined to be.
mother11: ^See, your existence, much like mine, is very crucial to Luminescira and how it thrives… You must be purified in order to be a Truthseer,
^You must be pure in order to thrive.
syviis7: ^What if I don't want my destiny...
motherNow: ^You must continue on your path and purify yourself, let me guid you, Syviis born Truthseer.
motherDestiny: ^If one faery doesn’t adhere to their destined role… well, it creates unbalance in Luminescira and we cannot have that, you see, we need the balance to remain pure. They simply must be replaced and discarded of their role as a faery.
mother12: ^The faeries discarded must be returned to their first purified state, their true form of Eldervitalis, to be brought back into Luminescira for better use.
mother13: ^So, Syviis, first of their name, destined born Truthseer,
syviisDestiny: ^I must do what I'm destined to do, for the sake of Luminescira…
syviisNo: ^I- I can’t do this… I won’t do this. Would anything ever be worth it in the end?
^If I live and become Truthseer, Lyra wouldn’t even know me, I would be a stranger to her, I wouldn’t even be able to speak to her, and I’d be stuck with every memory we’ve ever shared since we met!
^What about if I die? Will any trace of me still be wiped away to keep the balance? To make sure everyone remains pure?
syviis8: ^It's going to be useless either way... why would I...
^Why would I ven stay alive if nothing is worth living for...
motherDefect: ^Then you are defective, we cannot allow you to take up space here on Luminescira.
motherDefect1: ^In the womb of Eldervitalis, where roots entwine, and destinies align,
^Bearer of the Faerie Flame, heed the decree of the Great Mother's sign.
^Syviis, child of Luminescira's grace, your journey now meets its decree,
motherDefect2: ^In the heartbeat of the Mother, I claim what belongs to me.
^Neptunian Abyss, surrender the tides, Astral Haven's height, release,
^Eldervitalis, my essence, from your veins, now cease.
motherDefect3: ^Eldervitalis, life's essence, you endure no more.
^In this final proclamation, as we align,
^Cherish the purity, as life meets its design.
motherDefect4: ^Syviis, your spirit and being bows to my command,
^Farewell, Syviis, your presence fades from all,
^In Luminescira's shadow, where dominion reigns to all.
motherDestiny1: ^Yes, good Syviis, good... you are ready now.
motherDestiny2: ^Now insert your hands into my flesh, let the Eldervitalis flow through you.
^Get ready to embrace your pure form.
action3: ^ You insert your hands into the flesh of the Mother's womb.
^ Eldervitalis streams in through your skin, sending heat waves through your body.
motherDestiny3: ^Good, feel the power flow through you, ever so efficiently.
motherDesChant: ^In Eldervitalis' womb, roots entwine, faerie dreams align,
^Bearer of the Faerie Flame, Luminescira's chosen name.
motherDesChant1: ^Ether’s song in your heart hums, Eldervitalis’ spirit strums,
motherDesChant2: ^Hag Stone truths unfold, mysteries in your hands, we behold,
^In your power, our realm shall be.
motherDesChant4: ^Cherish the gift, I, the Great Mother bestows,
